instance_template: loc("A"). loc("B"). loc("C"). loc("D"). loc("E"). edge("A", "B"). edge("A", "C"). edge("B", "D"). edge("C", "E"). deliver_to("D"). deliver_to("E"). time(0..6).

hard_constraints.description: To properly initialize the mission, we must ensure that the robot is physically located at site A at the very first timestep.
Movement between any two locations is only permitted if there is a direct physical link defined in our map; the robot cannot jump between disconnected sites.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1), time(T), time(T+1), L1 != L2.

hard_constraints.description: Each designated delivery location must be visited by the robot exactly once during the 6-minute window to satisfy the delivery requirements.
The robot must move to a new location every minute; it is not permitted to remain stationary at its current location between timesteps.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L, T), at(L, T+1), time(T), time(T+1).
